entry.title: Sunday night: Chance of rain showers or flurries. Low plus 5. POP 30%
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. 30 percent chance of rain showers or flurries overnight. Wind southwest 30 km/h gusting to 60 becoming light near midnight. Low plus 5. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MDT Sunday 9 April 2023

entry.title: Monday: Chance of showers. High 8. POP 40%
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. 30 percent chance of rain showers or flurries early in the morning. 40 percent chance of rain showers in the afternoon. High 8. UV index 5 or moderate. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MDT Sunday 9 April 2023

entry.title: Monday night: Rain. Low minus 1.
entry.summary: Cloudy. 40 percent chance of rain showers early in the evening. Rain beginning in the evening then changing to snow overnight. Rainfall amount 5 mm. Snowfall amount 2 to 4 cm. Low minus 1. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MDT Sunday 9 April 2023
